reviewText: In very good condition, bought it for my grandson and he really enjoyed the movie and I did as well.
Title: Like Mike 2: Streetball

reviewText: This is another good movie for kids. My grandsons ages 11, 8, and 6 all loved it. They thought Like Mike was a little better than Like Mike 2 but they still loved it and have watched it several times also.
Title: Like Mike 2: Streetball

reviewText: [...]I was actually surprised by how much I enjoyed this one.  I like how it didn't try to copy line by line the original, or repeat the scenarios or scenes.  It was a nice twist to add the "street ball" nitch too.  The young actors were enjoyable to wach, and the acting was not bad.All in all, very nice film.1 star lower than 4, since it went straight to DVD.  Poor marketing for this one.Recommded.MC White
Title: Like Mike 2: Streetball

reviewText: I was very interested in purchasing part 2 because I had part 1 already. I thought maybe it would be a continuation from the first one with Bow Wow, but this one was totally different. Overall it's a good movie for kids.
Title: Like Mike 2: Streetball

reviewText: daughter just loved the first like mike that she was beyond excited to receive the continuation of the story on a different level and loved just as much.  thank you.
Title: Like Mike 2: Streetball
